posts.message:
Hello Geeks, I know my question seems repetitive but I am getting interesting to work in freelancing. I am Android Developer comes from Web development (PHP basically). I haven't done any freelancing jobs before and I would like to know HOW and WHERE I can start.

I would like to know:

How to find freelancing jobs (potential customers)?
How can you get paid for your work (payment methods) and on which basis (e.g, hourly or fixed price)?
How can you build reputation and marketing your self?

Any more advice or tips I will be so grateful.

Thanks in andvance, cheers :)

Hello folks,
I'm trying to make a web service to help make a live video stream between multiple mobile devices (Android and iOS) using the same application (something like google hangout video)
well, I don't know how to begin or what to do. I tried searching a lot but I couldn't understand anything. I found something called Kickflip 
(https://kickflip.io/)
but I couldn't understand its mechanism.
the question here is : what is the mechanism of something like this to be developed as a web service ?
Any suggestions for a library for this for Android and iOS ?

Note : web service is developed using ASP.NET Web API

posts.message:
I want your feedback about my app "Tabe3". I don't know If this post is violating rules. If it is, please remove it.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabe3.news

Tabe3 - "Follow" in Arabic - is an Arabic news reader app that starts from where others end. 

It lets you follow latest news from various fields: politics, sports, technology, entrepreneurship, economy, women, cooking, cars, travel, tourism and economy.

Also you can follow latest news from various countries: Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Lebanon, Jordan, Bahrain, Oman, Yemen, Tunisia, Morocco, Algeria , Iraq , Sudan, Palestine, Qatar, Syria and Libya

Although it is in its first version, but it has a lot of competetive features. More Major features to come in coming updates

Current version features:

- Just follow your favorite sources. Choose from hundreds of available sources.

- No more Internet. Save a copy of the news and read it later without Internet.

- No more loss of preferences. Log in using Facebook or Twitter or email to save your preferences online, you still can use the application without login.

- You will receive a notification when there is breaking news from your favorite sources only. You can stop the notification feature.

- You can add a comment to the news.

- You can favorite news.

- You can share news with various social networks.

- You can search for news

- App is following latest Google tips & tricks in terms of beauty of user interface, ease of use, reducing Internet connection and saving battery.

App Page on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabe3.news
Video for the app: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8NQ_Ss4Kvs

Websites wrote reviews about app:
Ardroid: http://bit.ly/1XcVN8G
http://tech-echo.com/2015/10/tabe3-news-reader/
http://www.navydroid.com/2015/10/tabe3-news-app.html

posts.message:
Not a Good News, our website www.kenrys.com got hacked and we managed to clean it.

Here is the issue for all of you guys to take care:

Check your wordpress website for the following:
1- Installed Plugin called "SEO Advisor"
2- In the plugins directory, any strange plugin folder like "Wordpress Researchers" or other not identified names.
3- Strange Tables in the WP DB like "wp_cont, wp_core_log"
4- Check your users and if there is any user added.
5- New posts published under you website and they will not appear under posts section in the Dashboard.

to make sure just do a search on google for all indexed urls example: "site:kenrys.com"

If you found anything from the above, then your website got hacked.

To clean it you have to do the following steps:

1- Take a backup (yes from the infected website, you might lose all content during the cleaning process - from database & files).

2- Remove all unwanted plugins (mentioned above), you might end up with a broken website, don worry if you found error regarding a plugin called xcalendar, then go edit the wp-config file and remove the line that call that plugin.

3- Install a security plugin like "Wordfence". and do a scan.
4- Go to database using "phpmyadmin" and search post in the wp_posts table, and delete the inserted posts.
5- Change all passwords, admin, database and even ftp or cpanel pass.
6- Make sure your wordpress and all plugins are updated.
7- Install a 404 redirect plugin to make use of the fake links as traffic ;)
8- Take another backup from the clean version.

Good luck, If you need any help, please let me know.
posts.caption: kenrys.com
posts.description: Kenrys are startups consultants, who deliver innovative affordable consultancy for web, mobile development, internet of things in Egypt
